pkgmetadata.longdescription: Community Estimation in G-Models via CORD // Partitions data points (variables) into communities/clusters, similar to clustering algorithms such as k-means and hierarchical clustering. This package implements a clustering algorithm based on a new metric CORD, defined for high-dimensional parametric or semiparametric distributions. For more details see Bunea et al. (2020), Annals of Statistics doi:10.1214/18-AOS1794.
